name: Mowteor
description:
Mowteor is a challenging lawn mowing game humorously based on Meteor (a spin-off). Although quite simple, some thought is needed to mow all of the grass within each level's time limit while watching the direction of the rain clouds (clouds make freshly mowed grass regrow). 

Map, tile and sprite editors are included. Meteor style "base folder" modding is fully supported. 

This game was created using SFML.
